Built an easy to access platform for SMEs, startups to get credit in the form of credit cards for spends.

Anyway, even today, with so many Fintechs servicing this segment, we are still not able to penetrate this segment wholly. It is still WiP.

Headline: Chemicals, AI enthusiast, Strategy, Investor, 3x Entrepreneur, Ivy League
Comment: Avik Ashar Aerem looks like an excellent example of outcome based credit access. The problem with traditional approach in lending to SMEs is a lot of upfront credit checks and guarantees which screens out over 50% of demand. Lenders often don’t monitor how the funds are being used and the quality of cash flows it generates, and hence, they try to impose rigorous conditions upfront to derisk themselves.
